text: Jene rakhuna, nisthapurna ebadata allahara'i nimitta. Yara allaha byatita aparake upasyarupe grahana kare rekheche ebam bale ye, amara tadera ebadata e jan'ye'i kari, yena tara amaderake allahara nikatabarti kare deya. Niscaya allaha tadera madhye tadera parasparika birodhapurna bisayera phayasala kare debena. Allaha mithyabadi kapherake satpathe paricalita karena na.
